name: CHAT_ACCESS_LOG
description: Table containing log of when Secure Chat was accessed.

columns.name: CONVERSATION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the secure chat conversation record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: READER_USER_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the user that read the message.

columns.name: READER_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ACCESSED_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the participant read the message.

columns.name: ACCESSED_MSG_LN
columns.description: The line of the message that was read.

columns.name: READER_MYPT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the MyChart user that read the message.
